query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZMMT136( MANDT , REQNO , REQSN , REQKIND , UPN , PS_PSPID , POSID2 , POSID , SPT , HNA , MATNR , MEINS , MENGE , NETPR , LGORT , APNAM , APDAT ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #REQNO# , #REQSN# , #REQKIND# , #UPN# , #PS_PSPID# , #POSID2# , #POSID# , #SPT# , #HNA# , #MATNR# , #MEINS# , #MENGE# , #SAMT1# , #LGORT# , #G_USER_ID# , HEX(CURRENT DATE)
)
